welcome_message_body: "Welcome to East Lampeter! Get ready to experience the charm of our quaint town, known for its beautiful farmlands and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lancaster Airport houses all necessary facilities for travelers, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipalcipal/Spaatz Field Airport handles all commercial flights and includes amenities such as restaurants, shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Municipalcipal/Spaatz Field Airport is used for private and corporate flights and offers services such as aircraft maintenance and fueling.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at York Airport, handling all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at York Airport, used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Harrisburg International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Harrisburg International Airport serves military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
